channel.title: CVE Feed for Mirantis -- Lens
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Mirantis -- Lens

item.title: CVE-2021-44458|2024-08-04T04:25:16.457Z -- mirantis -- lens
item.description: Linux users running Lens 5.2.6 and earlier could be compromised by visiting a malicious website. The malicious website could make websocket connections from the victim's browser to Lens and so operate the local terminal feature. This would allow the attacker to execute arbitrary commands as the Lens user.
